articles.description: Drugmaker’s plan moves the spotlight to industry middlemen, who face a barrage of investigations

articles.author: Evelyn Cheng
articles.title: China plans to revamp finance, tech oversight - CNBC
articles.description: China plans to overhaul its financial regulatory system by consolidating aspects of the central bank and securities regulator under a new entity.
articles.content:
